title: App Settings - Pixel 5
content: After having the device for a week, I am realizing that there is no longer a way to access a setting menu on most apps.  For example, I use a checkbook apl and the nbc live app.  I want to remove haptic feedback on the checkbook app and allow allow nbc to play over other apps.  There is no setting menu in either app.  Is it the operating system or the apps?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
